name: The Long Night (trmrddr, giraffalope, matthemagician)
description:
OH NOO!! Aliens have arrived and are taking your cats!! Play as Scraggly Pete™ to save as many cats by placing them inside the light/safe zone as possible! 

Please enjoy our game submission for GMTK GameJam 2020 with the theme "Out of Control".

Art by Giraffalope

Art & Animation by Trmrddr

Coding by Matthemagician

Music by Progs
